Cool Down (5 minutes)

Student-Facing Statement

The geometric sequence \(G\) starts 12, 6, . . .

  1. Write a recursive definition for sequence \(G\).
  2. Sketch a graph representing the first 5 terms of sequence \(G\).

Student Response

  1. \(g(1)=12,g(n)=0.5⋅g(n−1)\) for \(n\geq2\) or equivalent.

Response to Student Thinking

Points to Emphasize

If students still struggle, plan to spend more time on the launch to 7.2.
